HeroSection.title: Smart Finance Tracking, Invoicing & Money Growth
HeroSection.subtitle: Your money, simplified. seamless invoicing, smart budgeting, expense tracking, and wealth growth. Finance made simple, for today and tomorrow.

ContactPage.title: Contact us
ContactPage.description: Feel free to reach out using the form below.

name.min: Name must be at least 2 characters.

message.min: Message must be at least 5 characters.

profile.title: User Profile

profile.socialAuthEmailChangeDisabled: Email change is not available for accounts connected via Google or Discord.

validation.nameRequired: Name must be at least 2 characters
validation.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 8 characters

Auth.emailSentMessage: We've sent a verification email to your address.
Auth.emailSentInstructions: Click the link in the email to verify your account and access the dashboard.
Auth.enterEmailForReset: Enter your email to receive a reset link
Auth.emailVerifiedSuccess: Your email has been successfully verified. You can now log in to access your dashboard.
Auth.verificationLinkExpiredMessage: Your verification link has expired. Please request a new one.
Auth.verificationFailedMessage: There was an error verifying your email. Please try again or request a new verification link.
Auth.pleaseWaitVerifying: Please wait while we verify your email address.
Auth.resetEmailSentMessage: We've sent a password reset link to {email}. Please check your inbox and follow the instructions.
Auth.passwordResetEmailSent: Password reset email sent! Check your inbox.
Auth.emailChangeVerificationDescription: We're verifying your email change request
Auth.emailChangeSuccess: Your email address has been changed successfully!
Auth.emailChangeVerifiedSuccess: Your new email address has been verified and activated. You can now use your new address to sign in.
Auth.emailChangeExpiredMessage: Your email change verification link has expired. Please request a new change from your profile.
Auth.emailChangeFailedMessage: An error occurred while verifying your email change. Please try again or contact support.
